entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers beginning this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning then north 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to snow or freezing drizzle this evening and ending overnight then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
